column5: Check out this link!!!  I might think twice before waiting so long for a shot!!!   http://www.break.com/index/how-to-piss-off-a-moose.html  Hopedfully he had a change of underwear in his backpack
That is crazy, I have had bull moose close but not that close. I would need to change my underware for sure.
Scary stuff. This is an old one but I can feel that guys pain.
